articles.author: Jennifer Rankin
articles.title: EU must have ‘frank, exacting’ dialogue with Russia, Macron says - The Guardian
articles.description: French president spoke alongside Ursula von der Leyen, who pledged an ‘architecture of European security’
articles.content:
Emmanuel Macron has said the EU needs a frank, exacting dialogue with Russia to defuse tensions, as he called for new security arrangements on the continent.
The French president was rebuffed by oth… [+4369 chars]

articles.title: Eurozone Inflation Hits New Record, Further Pressuring ECB - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: A jump in food prices adds to the challenges facing the European Central Bank as it says rate rises likely won’t be needed to tame inflation
articles.content: Consumer prices in the eurozone increased at a record pace in the year through December as food prices jumped, presenting a fresh challenge for the European Central Bank as it strives to persuade hou… [+4720 chars]
